com.ibm.eventstreams.serdes

Class SchemaRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.eventstreams.serdes.SchemaRegistry

  • public class SchemaRegistry
extends Object
    Helper class for retrieving schema definitions from the Schema Registry.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SchemaRegistry(Properties properties) 
      SchemaRegistry(String apiurl, String apikey, boolean skipSslValidation) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SchemaInfo getDefaultSchema()
      Get the default schema as determined by the SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_ID_OVERRIDE and SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_VERSION_OVERRIDE configuration options.
      org.apache.kafka.common.header.Headers getOverrideHeaders()
      Get the Kafka headers for the default schema as determined by the SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_ID_OVERRIDE and SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_VERSION_OVERRIDE configuration options.
      SchemaInfo getSchema(String schemaId, int versionId)
      Retrieves a single schema from the Registry.
      SchemaInfo getSchema(String schemaName, String versionName)
      Retrieves a single schema from the Registry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchemaRegistry

        public SchemaRegistry(Properties properties)
               throws KeyManagementException,
                      NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                      SchemaRegistryAuthException,
                      SchemaRegistryServerErrorException,
                      SchemaRegistryApiException,
                      SchemaRegistryConnectionException,
                      SchemaNotFoundException,
                      PropertyNotFoundException,
                      InvalidPropertyValueException
        Parameters:
        properties - a set of configuration properties
        Throws:
        KeyManagementException - in the event of a failure to configure TLS for the connection to the Schema Registry
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - in the event of a failure to configure TLS for the connection to the Schema Registry
        SchemaRegistryAuthException - if there is a problem with the provided API key
        SchemaRegistryServerErrorException - if the Schema Registry REST API returns an HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
        SchemaRegistryApiException - in the event of an unexpected response from the Schema Registry
        SchemaRegistryConnectionException - in the event of a failure to connect to the Schema Registry (e.g. a socket timeout)
        PropertyNotFoundException - in the event a required property is not specified
        InvalidPropertyValueException - in the event of a property set to an invalid value
        SchemaNotFoundException

      • SchemaRegistry

        public SchemaRegistry(String apiurl,
                      String apikey,
                      boolean skipSslValidation)
               throws KeyManagementException,
                      NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                      SchemaRegistryAuthException,
                      SchemaRegistryApiException,
                      SchemaRegistryServerErrorException,
                      SchemaRegistryConnectionException
        Parameters:
        apiurl - url for the Event Streams REST API
        apikey - API key for use in accessing the Event Streams REST API
        skipSslValidation - if true, the hostname will not be verified in certificates used for the TLS connection to the Schema Registry REST API. Available for use when the Event Streams installation is using a self-signed certificate.
        Throws:
        KeyManagementException - in the event of a failure to configure TLS for the connection to the Schema Registry
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - in the event of a failure to configure TLS for the connection to the Schema Registry
        SchemaRegistryAuthException - if there is a problem with the provided API key
        SchemaRegistryServerErrorException - if the Schema Registry REST API returns an HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
        SchemaRegistryApiException - in the event of an unexpected response from the Schema Registry
        SchemaRegistryConnectionException - in the event of a failure to connect to the Schema Registry (e.g. a socket timeout)

    • Method Detail

      • getSchema

        public SchemaInfo getSchema(String schemaId,
                            int versionId)
                     throws SchemaNotFoundException,
                            SchemaRegistryAuthException,
                            SchemaRegistryApiException,
                            SchemaRegistryServerErrorException,
                            SchemaRegistryConnectionException
        Retrieves a single schema from the Registry.
        Parameters:
        schemaId - ID of the schema to retrieve
        versionId - integer value version ID of the schema to retrieve
        Throws:
        SchemaNotFoundException - if the schema (or version) does not exist
        SchemaRegistryAuthException - if an auth error prevented the schema being fetched
        SchemaRegistryServerErrorException - if the Schema Registry failed to retrieve the schema
        SchemaRegistryApiException - in the event of an unexpected response from the Schema Registry
        SchemaRegistryConnectionException - in the event of a failure to connect to the Schema Registry (e.g. a socket timeout)

      • getSchema

        public SchemaInfo getSchema(String schemaName,
                            String versionName)
                     throws SchemaNotFoundException,
                            SchemaRegistryAuthException,
                            SchemaRegistryApiException,
                            SchemaRegistryServerErrorException,
                            SchemaRegistryConnectionException
        Retrieves a single schema from the Registry. This method is available to improve usability, allowing developers to get schemas based on the original name and version set, this method is not used internally by the serializer/deserializer.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - unique name of the schema to retrieve
        versionName - version name of the schema to retrieve
        Throws:
        SchemaNotFoundException - if the schema (or version) does not exist
        SchemaRegistryAuthException - if an auth error prevented the schema being fetched
        SchemaRegistryServerErrorException - if the Schema Registry failed to retrieve the schema
        SchemaRegistryApiException - in the event of an unexpected response from the Schema Registry
        SchemaRegistryConnectionException - in the event of a failure to connect to the Schema Registry (e.g. a socket timeout)

      • getDefaultSchema

        public SchemaInfo getDefaultSchema()
        Get the default schema as determined by the SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_ID_OVERRIDE and SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_VERSION_OVERRIDE configuration options.
        Returns:
        The SchemaInfo for the default schema

      • getOverrideHeaders

        public org.apache.kafka.common.header.Headers getOverrideHeaders()
        Get the Kafka headers for the default schema as determined by the SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_ID_OVERRIDE and SchemaRegistryConfig.PROPERTY_SCHEMA_VERSION_OVERRIDE configuration options.
        Returns:
        the Headers for the default schema
